title: Spacious 1 Bedroom
posting_body: ['Welcome to Sevilla Condos!', 'Our community offers large, open floorplans including some townhomes.', 'In our homes you will find features such as: wood-like plank style flooring, full size washer/dryer connections, fireplaces and lots of closet space.', 'These apartments were made with you in mind!', 'Ample parking, a refreshing pool (open seasonally), and tons of walking trails nearby are just some of the things you have to look forward to while making Sevilla your home.', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183', '-Microwave', '-Pet Friendly', '-Carpeted', '-Spanish Speaking Staff', '-W/D Hookup', '-Swimming Pool', '-Clubhouse', '-Ceiling Fan', '-On-Site Management', '-Electronic Thermostat', '-Vaulted Ceilings', '-Laundry Facilities', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
